item.title: Magic Shortbow Special
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

[quote=“hellobud, post:7, topic:170434”]EDIT:

public void bowSpecc() { if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861); { setAnimation(426); actionTimer = 4; SpecDamgNPC(30); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; resetAnimation(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamgNPC(30); SpecialDelay -= 1; } else if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861); { int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; SpecDamg(30); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; startAnimation(426); actionTimer = 4; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecialDelay -= 1; } }
try that i think it sould work[/quote]
Nah just 100 errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Magic Shortbow Special
item.dc:creator: @hellobud hellobud
item.description:
@hellobud wrote:

EDIT:

public void bowSpecc() { if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861); { setAnimation(426); actionTimer = 4; SpecDamgNPC(30); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; resetAnimation(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamgNPC(30); SpecialDelay -= 1; } else if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861); { int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; SpecDamg(30); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; startAnimation(426); actionTimer = 4; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecialDelay -= 1; } }
try that i think it sould work

item.title: Magic Shortbow Special
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

Hey, anyone know what’s wrong with this void?

public void bowSpecc() { if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861) { setAnimation(426); actionTimer = 4; SpecDamgNPC(30); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; resetAnimation(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamgNPC(30); SpecialDelay -= 1; } else if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861) { int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; SpecDamg(30); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; startAnimation(426); actionTimer = 4; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecialDelay -= 1; } }

Read full topic
